alert.note: Alert for Sheridan Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 2:51PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL SHERIDAN COUNTY THROUGH 315 PM MDT... At 249 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Ranchester, or 11 miles north of Sheridan. Movement was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail and torrential rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sheridan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
